reflection.description: A high-level reflection on the evaluation task (approximately 300 words), summarizing the nature and complexity of the question, outlining key strengths and potential areas for improvement in the given answer, and briefly describing the approach to ensuring a fair and thorough evaluation.

Accuracy.description: Score for factual correctness compared to the golden answer

Completeness.description: Score for thoroughness in covering all aspects addressed in the golden answer

Relevance.description: Score for addressing specific points of the complex question

Evidence Quality.description: Score for reliability and authority of cited sources

Clarity.description: Score for clarity and ease of understanding

Logical Structure.description: Score for organization and logical presentation

Evidence Support.description: Score for use of evidence to support claims

Objectivity.description: Score for balanced and unbiased perspective

Synthesis.description: Score for integration of information from multiple sources or viewpoints
